actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 514(b) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to restrict preemption of State law as it relates to employee welfare benefits plans only to the extent such plans are subject to other titles of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act. Employee Retirement Income Security Act.

summary.text: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to limit the preemption by that Act of State regulation of employee welfare benefit plans to those plans which are subject to Titles I and IV of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 514(b) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to restrict preemption of State law as it relates to employee welfare benefits plans only to the extent such plans are subject to other titles of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act. Employee Retirement Income Security Act.
